summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4352 for the improvement of West 74th Street from 28th avenue Northwest to 33rd Avenue Northwest; by constructing sewers together with necessary appurtenances, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51553, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
